Class Block

  • java.lang.Object
    • Block

  • public class Block
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the object holder for every block inside of the blockchain. Every block consists of an index, a timestamp since its creation, a transaction, a nonce (randomized string), the hash of the previous block and the block's own hash.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor of the class Transaction

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getHash()
      Returns the String representing hash of the Block object.
      int getIndex()
      Returns the Integer representing the index of Block in the BlockChain.

      Returns the String representing nonce of block.
      java.lang.String getPreviousH()
      Returns the String representing has of the previous Block in the BlockChain.
      long getTime()
      Returns the Long representing time since timestamp was created.
      Transaction getTransaction()
      Returns a Transaction object representing Transaction linked to the Block.

      Sets the String representing hash of block.
      void setNonce(java.lang.String s)
      Sets the String representing nonce of block.

      Returns the String representing of the Block.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Block

        public Block(int index,
             long time,
             Transaction transaction,
             java.lang.String prev,
             java.lang.String hash,
             java.lang.String nonce)
        Constructor of the class Transaction
        Parameters:
        index - Integer corresponding to the index of the Block in the BlockChain.
        time - Long corresponding to the System milliseconds of when the Block was created.
        transaction - Transaction corresponding the Transaction tied to the Block.
        prev - String corresponding to the generated hash of the previous Block in the BlockChain
        hash - String corresponding to the generated hash of the Block object.
        nonce - String that is randomly generated in order to create hash.
        See Also:
        Transaction
